Package teal.render

Provides interfaces and classes used in the render packages.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HasBackgroundImage  
    HasBoundingArea
    Objects that have a bounding area should implement this interface.
    HasColor
    Objects that have a modifiable color should implement this interface.
    HasDirection
    All objects which have the ability to have a direction need to implement this.
    HasFog  
    HasNode3D
    Objects that have a modifiable color should implement this interface.
    HasPosition
    Objects that have a physical position should implement this interface.
    HasRotation
    Objects that may be rotated should implement this interface.
    HasTransform
    Objects that have a transform (Transform3D) should implement this interface.
    IsMoveable
    Objects that may be translated should implement this interface.
    IsPickable
    This interface defines methods for handling "picking" (ie clicking on objects) in the viewer.
    TAbstractRendered  
    TDrawable
    An interface for Elements that may be represented in 2D and/or 3D
    TransformChangeListener  
    TRendered
    An interface for Elements that may be represented in 2D and/or 3D
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Rendered
    Provides basic support for any rendered object that may be represented in the Model's views.
    RenderedBeanInfo  

Package teal.render Description

Provides interfaces and classes used in the render packages. This sentence is here to prevent errors when generating javadocs.
